name: Dogfights (itch)
description:
This is a student final project made in LADAT Studios.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dogfights is a single-player third-person shooter game, where you will control a plane with the mission to destroy a zeppelin and a squadron of enemy planes in a fictional battle.


Storyline

We are at a decisive moment that could end the war in a single scenario, without having to risk more lives than necessary. Only you will take action.

After the events that have favored our advance towards the liberation of new territories, Bloody Baron has been overexposed and is fleeing with a zeppelin escorted by his elite aviation squadron called Storm Crows, in the direction of what would be for us enemy territory to get to safety.

Your mission is to stop him before it is too late and put an end to this barbarism.

Controls

ActionsKeyboard  Xbox ControllerMovement ArrowsJoystick LeftYawA, DJoystick RightShoot Spacebar [HOLD]RT [HOLD]ThrustW [HOLD] LT [HOLD]RepairX [HOLD]Y [HOLD]ReloadRXPauseEscStartAcceptEnterA

~ A game developed by Tomeu de la Parte Mulet
